title: BG11 medium

authors.name: Roscoff Culture Collection
authors.affiliation: CNRS-Sorbonne Université, Station Biologique, Place G. Tessier 29680 Roscoff FRANCE

source.description:
• Under hood, to 1L of sterile water, add 20 mL of Cyanobacteria BG-11 Freshwater Solution from Sigma
  • Filter the medium on 0,2 microns

source.title: Recipe for standard BG-11 media
